title: Buffs
description: Buffs that apply to the character. The buffs are applied after the calculations of character properties.

character.title: Character
character.description: The buffs that apply to the character itself.

a4.title: Static Electricity Field
a4.description: Opponents hit by Lightning Rose have their DEF decreased by 15% for 10s.

c2.title: Electromagnetic Field
c2.description: Holding Violet Arc has the following effects: ·Increases DEF by 25%. ·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

skill.title: Icetide Vortex
skill.description: Sharp frost, swift blade. Tap/Press Slashes swiftly, dealing Cryo DMG. When it hits an opponent, Eula gains a stack of Grimheart that stacks up to 2 times. These stacks can only be gained once every 0.3s. Grimheart Increases Eula's resistance to interruption and DEF. Hold Wielding her sword, Eula consumes all the stacks of Grimheart and lashes forward, dealing AoE Cryo DMG to opponents in front of her. If Grimheart stacks are consumed, surrounding opponents will have their Physical RES and Cryo RES decreased. Each consumed stack of Grimheart will be converted into an Icewhirl Brand that deals Cryo DMG to nearby opponents. "So the waves roiled, swallowing the crown of the nobles. And ever after did each drop amidst the icy waves reflect a golden crown, each and every droplet of the spray shining with its light."

c1.title: Tidal Illusion
c1.description: Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s. Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

c5.title: Chivalric Quality
c5.description: Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c1.title: Excellent Blood
c1.description: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

a1.title: Pounding Surprise
a1.description: When Jumpy Dumpty and Normal Attacks deal DMG, Klee has a 50% chance to obtain an Explosive Spark. This Explosive Spark is consumed by the next Charged Attack, which costs no Stamina and deals 50% increased DMG.

c2.title: Explosive Frags
c2.description: Being hit by Jumpy Dumpty's mines decreases opponents' DEF by 23% for 10s.

c6.title: Blazing Delight
c6.description: While under the effects of Sparks 'n' Splash, Klee will regenerate 3 Energy for all members of the party (excluding Klee) every 3s. When Sparks 'n' Splash is used, all party members will gain a 10% Pyro DMG Bonus for 25s.

a1.title: Every Arrow Finds Its Target
a1.description: Increases the CRIT Rate of Fiery Rain by 10% and widens its AoE by 30%.

a4.title: Precise Shot
a4.description: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase ATK by 15% for 10s.

c2.title: Bunny Triggered
c2.description:
Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.
Explosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

c6.title: Wildfire
c6.description: Fiery Rain increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

c6.title: Intertwined Winds
c6.description: Targets who take DMG from Gust Surge have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

c2.title: Breeze of Reminiscence
c2.description: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s. Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

c4.title: Hurricane of Freedom
c4.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

c6.title: Storm of Defiance
c6.description: Targets who take DMG from Wind's Grand Ode have their Anemo RES decreased by 20%. If an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

burst.title: Fantastic Voyage
burst.description:
Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field.

Inspiration Field
· If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP.
· If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK.
· Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.

Benny's Adventure Team's adventures are always fraught with unexpected danger. However, Bennett is more inclined to call them "journeys full of wonder, excitement, and beauty."

c2.title: Impasse Conqueror
c2.description: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

c6.title: Fire Ventures with Me
c6.description: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.

c1.title: Spiraling Tempest
c1.description: Increases the pulling speed of Gale Blade after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

c4.title: Lands of Dandelion
c4.description: Within the Field created by Dandelion Breeze, all opponents have their Anemo RES decreased by 40%.

a1.title: Catalyst Conversion
a1.description: When Sucrose triggers a Swirl reaction, all characters in the party with the matching element (excluding Sucrose) have their Elemental Mastery increased by 50 for 8s.

a4.title: Mollis Favonius
a4.description: When Astable Anemohypostasis Creation - 6308 or Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II hits an opponent, increases all party members' (excluding Sucrose) Elemental Mastery by an amount equal to 20% of Sucrose's Elemental Mastery for 8s.

c6.title: Chaotic Entropy
c6.description: If Forbidden Creation - Isomer 75 / Type II triggers an Elemental Absorption, all party members gain a 20% Elemental DMG Bonus for the corresponding absorbed element during its duration.

a1.title: Regina Probationum
a1.description: When Rosaria strikes an opponent from behind using Ravaging Confession, Rosaria's CRIT Rate increases by 12% for 5s.

a4.title: Shadow Samaritan
a4.description: Casting Rites of Termination increases CRIT Rate of all nearby party members (except Rosaria herself) by 15% of Rosaria's CRIT Rate for 10s. CRIT Rate Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 15%.

c1.title: Unholy Revelation
c1.description: When Rosaria deals a CRIT Hit, her ATK SPD increases by 10% and her Normal Attack DMG increases by 10% for 4s.

c6.title: Divine Retribution
c6.description: Rites of Termination's attack decreases opponents' Physical RES by 20% for 10s.

c2.title: Vitality Burst
c2.description: Decreases the CD of Let the Show Begin♪ by 15%. During the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% Hydro DMG Bonus.

burst.title: Illusory Torrent
burst.description: Alternate Sprint Mona cloaks herself within the water's flow, consuming Stamina to move rapidly. When under the effect of Illusory Torrent, Mona can move at high speed on water. Applies the Wet status to nearby opponents when she reappears. This is something that Mona can do, but her teacher cannot. Well, but it's not as if her teacher would pursue any matter concerning Hydro Visions anyway...

a4.title: Waterborne Destiny
a4.description: Increases Mona's Hydro DMG Bonus by a degree equivalent to 20% of her Energy Recharge rate.

activated.description: Whether this ascention bonus is activated.

c1.title: Prophecy of Submersion
c1.description:
When any of your own party members hits an opponent affected by an Omen, the effects of Hydro-related Elemental Reactions are enhanced for 8s:
· Electro-Charged DMG increases by 15%.
· Vaporize DMG increases by 15%.
· Hydro Swirl DMG increases by 15%.
· Frozen duration is extended by 15%.

c4.title: Prophecy of Oblivion
c4.description: When any party member attacks an opponent affected by an Omen, their CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

c6.title: Rhetorics of Calamitas
c6.description: Upon entering Illusory Torrent, Mona gains a 60% increase to the DMG of her next Charged Attack per second of movement. A maximum DMG Bonus of 180% can be achieved in this manner. The effect lasts for no more than 8s.

burst.title: Sweeping Time
burst.description: Gathering the strength of stone around her weapon, Noelle strikes the opponents surrounding her within a large AoE, dealing Geo DMG. Afterwards, Noelle gains the following effects: ·Larger attack AoE. ·Converts attack DMG to Geo DMG that cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion. ·Increased ATK that scales based on her DEF. Sometimes, it's not just dust that needs sweeping...

c2.title: Combat Maid
c2.description: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

c6.title: Must Be Spotless
c6.description: Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF. Additionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

a4.title: Blessing of Phoenix
a4.description: The Pyro Infusion provided by Dawn lasts for 4s longer. Additionally, Diluc gains 20% Pyro DMG Bonus during the duration of this effect.

c1.title: Conviction
c1.description: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

c2.title: Searing Ember
c2.description:
When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.
This effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

c4.title: Flowing Flame
c4.description: Casting Searing Onslaught in rhythm greatly increases damage dealt. 2s after casting Searing Onslaught, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for 2s.

c6.title: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
c6.description: After casting Searing Onslaught, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%. Additionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.

team_characters.title: Team Character
team_characters.description: The buffs that apply to the team characters.

absorbed_element.description: The element type Gust Surge absorbed. If the element is not absorbed, this property is anemo. If enemy is not hit by the burst, this property is null.

c2.title: Breeze of Reminiscence
c2.description: Skyward Sonnet decreases opponents' Anemo RES and Physical RES by 12% for 10s. Opponents launched by Skyward Sonnet suffer an additional 12% Anemo RES and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

burst_hit.description: Whether the burst hit the enemy.

burst_launched.description: Whether the enemy is launched by this burst.

c4.description: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% Anemo DMG Bonus for 10s.

c6.title: Storm of Defiance

absorbed_element.description: The element type Wind's Grand Ode absorbed. If the element is not absorbed, this property is anemo. If enemy is not hit by the burst, this property is null.

within_aoe.description: The buff that applies to characters within the burst AoE.

activated.description: Whether the character is within the AoE.

activated.description: Whether the enemy is hit by Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst.

activated.description: Whether Rites of Termination was casted.
